API Documentation¶

Model definitions for the MongoDB can be found in the pycoshark models.

visualSHARK.views¶

class visualSHARK.views.CodeEntityStateViewSet(**kwargs)[source]¶

API Endpoint for CodeEntityStates.

list(request)[source]¶

Again a nested serializer.

class visualSHARK.views.CommitGraphViewSet(**kwargs)[source]¶

Commit Graph ReST endpoint.

This endpoint reads the commit graph nodes and their positions (according to graphviz) from the file generated during execution of the create_commit_graph command and returns it for the commit graph SVG.

articulation_points(request, vcs_system_id=None)[source]¶

Return list of nodes that are articulation points.

mark_nodes(request, vcs_system_id=None)[source]¶

Generic node marker.

We can mark nodes according to search terms or because auf certain (boolan) labels.

product_path(request, vcs_system_id=None)[source]¶

Return path for the approach used in this exact product.

class visualSHARK.views.CommitViewSet(**kwargs)[source]¶

API Endpoint for Commits.

get_queryset()[source]¶

Add special case if we search for a person, could be committer or author.

retrieve(request, id=None)[source]¶

Add additional information the each tag.

class visualSHARK.views.FileActionViewSet(**kwargs)[source]¶

API Endpoint for FileActions.

list(request)[source]¶

Again a nested serializer.

class visualSHARK.views.MongoReadOnlyModelViewSet(**kwargs)[source]¶

Helper to allow filtering and searching via the ReST API.

get_queryset()[source]¶

Apply requested searches and filters to the queryset.

class visualSHARK.views.ProductViewSet(**kwargs)[source]¶

Product data from mynbouSHARK.

class visualSHARK.views.RelatedOrderingFilter[source]¶

Extends OrderingFilter to support ordering by fields in related models.

is_valid_field(model, field)[source]¶

Return true if the field exists within the model (or in the related

model specified using the Django ORM __ notation)

class visualSHARK.views.TagViewSet(**kwargs)[source]¶

API Endpoint for Tags.

list(request)[source]¶

Nested serializer, we need additional actions for pagination.

visualSHARK.models¶

class visualSHARK.models.CommitGraph(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Contains the raw data (pickle) and pre-computed graph nodes and their layout for the CommitGraph View.

class visualSHARK.models.CommitLabelField(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Contains currently available commit labels from labelSHARK.

This needs to be synced with the fetch_commit_label_approaches command.

class visualSHARK.models.ProjectStats(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Contains project stats per day.
